attributes.action: Make car insurance prices for new drivers cheaper
attributes.additional_details: If the insurance pricing scheme was to change and be fair to everyone, It would motivate more young people to attain the proud feeling of owning a driver's license and actually not going bankrupt after paying for an Insurance policy.
attributes.background: When a young person first passes their driving test they are expected to pay upwards of £2000 a year for car insurance which forces new drivers off of the road. Car insurance companies should not be allowed to charge such ludicrously high prices.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/580094
